quote: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.   – Kahlil Gibran
fact: In the early 1940s, the FCC assigned television`s Channel 1 to mobile services (like two-way radios in taxis) but did not re-number the other channel assignments.
joke: What did the drummer name her twin daughters? Anna One, Anna Two...
